thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Janjan

author: Janjan
title: Janjan
text: My front tire blew out this past Tuesday evening. I brougjt my car to Town Fair Tire Wed. morning. I picked it up right after work. Everything was perfect! Fair prices, great service, friendly and professional . And KUDOS to the store manager Danny Russo ðŸ˜€ He runs a great business...THANKS SO MUCH for a great experience! (Norwich store)
